name: Light and Bacteria
description:
Links
  • Archived Ludum Dare page
  • Source
  • Timelapse
Description

Growing bacteria using light and solving puzzles doing so.

First time using Unity, didn't think the idea was good enough at first, but with a few helpful tips it has still become a playable game (you be the judge ;)).

I *REALLY* like to know:
* Where you got stuck.
* Where was more guidance/instructions preferable.

Any other issue is also much appreciated. The WebGL version had shader problems, so I hope no other platforms are affected.

Any and all feedback is very much appreciated!
